languages.text: "Госпожа губернатор — прекрасный лидер. Она отлично во всем разбирается и никогда не путает формуляры. Я не лезу в ее личные дела, но, если позволите говорить прямо, на мой взгляд женщина, которая так изумительно заполняет документы, не может быть плохим человеком".

traits.locale_text: "Госпожа губернатор — прекрасный лидер. Она отлично во всем разбирается и никогда не путает формуляры. Я не лезу в ее личные дела, но, если позволите говорить прямо, на мой взгляд женщина, которая так изумительно заполняет документы, не может быть плохим человеком".

languages.text: "The governor is a superb leader. She possesses an excellent grasp of all matters and never uses an incorrect form for a given situation. I do not pry into her personal affairs, but if I may speak plainly, a lady who fills out paperwork with such finesse cannot be a bad person, in my view."
languages.original_text: "Госпожа губернатор — прекрасный лидер. Она отлично во всем разбирается и никогда не путает формуляры. Я не лезу в ее личные дела, но, если позволите говорить прямо, на мой взгляд женщина, которая так изумительно заполняет документы, не может быть плохим человеком".

I do not pry into her personal affairs, but if I may speak plainly, a lady who fills out paperwork with such finesse cannot be a bad person, in my view."

"The governor is a superb leader. She possesses an excellent grasp of all matters and never uses an incorrect form for a given situation. I do not pry into her personal affairs, but if I may speak plainly, a lady who fills out paperwork with such finesse cannot be a bad person, in my view."

"The governor is a superb leader. She possesses an excellent grasp of all matters and never uses an incorrect form for a given situation. I do not pry into her personal affairs, but if I may speak plainly, a lady who fills out paperwork with such finesse cannot be a bad person, in my view."

"The governor is a superb leader. She possesses an excellent grasp of all matters and never uses an incorrect form for a given situation. I do not pry into her personal affairs, but if I may speak plainly, a lady who fills out paperwork with such finesse cannot be a bad person, in my view."

languages.text: “总督是位杰出的领袖。她会把所有的事务都打理得井井有条，而且哪怕是特殊情况下，也绝不会采取不合适的做法。我从不打听她的私事，但如果您允许我直截了当地开口，我会认为，总是把文件填写得这么仔细的女士，不可能是坏人。”
languages.original_text: "The governor is a superb leader. She possesses an excellent grasp of all matters and never uses an incorrect form for a given situation. I do not pry into her personal affairs, but if I may speak plainly, a lady who fills out paperwork with such finesse cannot be a bad person, in my view."

traits.locale_text: “总督是位杰出的领袖。她会把所有的事务都打理得井井有条，而且哪怕是特殊情况下，也绝不会采取不合适的做法。我从不打听她的私事，但如果您允许我直截了当地开口，我会认为，总是把文件填写得这么仔细的女士，不可能是坏人。”

languages.text: «La gobernadora es una líder magnífica. Cuenta con una comprensión excelente de todos los asuntos y nunca utiliza un formulario incorrecto para ninguna situación. Desconozco sus asuntos personales, pero, si me permite hablar con franqueza, una mujer que cumplimenta su papeleo con tanta destreza no puede ser mala persona, en mi opinión».
languages.original_text: "The governor is a superb leader. She possesses an excellent grasp of all matters and never uses an incorrect form for a given situation. I do not pry into her personal affairs, but if I may speak plainly, a lady who fills out paperwork with such finesse cannot be a bad person, in my view."

traits.locale_text: «La gobernadora es una líder magnífica. Cuenta con una comprensión excelente de todos los asuntos y nunca utiliza un formulario incorrecto para ninguna situación. Desconozco sus asuntos personales, pero, si me permite hablar con franqueza, una mujer que cumplimenta su papeleo con tanta destreza no puede ser mala persona, en mi opinión».

languages.text: 「総督は最高の指導者です。あらゆる問題を深く理解し、状況に合わせて打つ手を誤ることはまずありません。総督の個人的なことは関知していませんが、正直に申し上げて、あれほどの手腕で書類仕事をこなせる女性が悪い人なはずないと思います」
languages.original_text: "The governor is a superb leader. She possesses an excellent grasp of all matters and never uses an incorrect form for a given situation. I do not pry into her personal affairs, but if I may speak plainly, a lady who fills out paperwork with such finesse cannot be a bad person, in my view."

traits.locale_text: 「総督は最高の指導者です。あらゆる問題を深く理解し、状況に合わせて打つ手を誤ることはまずありません。総督の個人的なことは関知していませんが、正直に申し上げて、あれほどの手腕で書類仕事をこなせる女性が悪い人なはずないと思います」

languages.text: "Die Gouverneurin ist eine ausgezeichnete Anführerin. Sie hat immer alles im Griff und trifft in jeder Situation die richtige Entscheidung. Über ihr Privatleben weiß ich nichts, aber darf ich offen sprechen: Eine Dame, die so erstklassig Formulare ausfüllt, kann meiner Ansicht nach kein schlechter Mensch sein."
languages.original_text: "The governor is a superb leader. She possesses an excellent grasp of all matters and never uses an incorrect form for a given situation. I do not pry into her personal affairs, but if I may speak plainly, a lady who fills out paperwork with such finesse cannot be a bad person, in my view."

traits.locale_text: "Die Gouverneurin ist eine ausgezeichnete Anführerin. Sie hat immer alles im Griff und trifft in jeder Situation die richtige Entscheidung. Über ihr Privatleben weiß ich nichts, aber darf ich offen sprechen: Eine Dame, die so erstklassig Formulare ausfüllt, kann meiner Ansicht nach kein schlechter Mensch sein."

languages.text: « La gouverneure est une remarquable dirigeante. Elle s'acquitte de ses fonctions avec brio sur tous les plans et utilise toujours les formulaires corrects. Je ne me mêle pas de ses affaires personnelles, mais si je puis parler franchement et donner mon humble avis, une dame qui remplit ses documents avec une telle finesse ne peut pas avoir un mauvais fond. »
languages.original_text: "The governor is a superb leader. She possesses an excellent grasp of all matters and never uses an incorrect form for a given situation. I do not pry into her personal affairs, but if I may speak plainly, a lady who fills out paperwork with such finesse cannot be a bad person, in my view."

traits.locale_text: « La gouverneure est une remarquable dirigeante. Elle s'acquitte de ses fonctions avec brio sur tous les plans et utilise toujours les formulaires corrects. Je ne me mêle pas de ses affaires personnelles, mais si je puis parler franchement et donner mon humble avis, une dame qui remplit ses documents avec une telle finesse ne peut pas avoir un mauvais fond. »

languages.text: "Valimiz mükemmel bir liderdir. Her konuda mükemmel bir idraka sahiptir ve koşullara uymayan bir form kullandığı görülmemiştir. Özel hayatına burnumu sokmak bana düşmez ama açık konuşmam gerekirse evraklarını bu kadar ustalıkla dolduran bir hanımefendinin kötü bir insan olamayacağı kanaatindeyim."
languages.original_text: "The governor is a superb leader. She possesses an excellent grasp of all matters and never uses an incorrect form for a given situation. I do not pry into her personal affairs, but if I may speak plainly, a lady who fills out paperwork with such finesse cannot be a bad person, in my view."
